title: Ineos Grenadiers Performance Brainiac Bigham Quits Team in Shock Exit: ‘We Should Be Doing a Lot Better’
content:
Dan Bigham blasts direction at Ineos Grenadiers; team signs veterans to mentor young talents while rivals snap up proven winners and leaders.

Read the full article at Ineos Grenadiers Performance Brainiac Bigham Quits Team in Shock Exit: ‘We Should Be Doing a Lot Better’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
